jcr:content.jcr:title: Public holidays in the Democratic Republic of the Congo

contentheadline.headline: Public holidays in the Democratic Republic of the Congo

contentrichtext.text: :This is a list of '''[[holidays]] in the [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]]''' {| cellpadding=4 cellspacing=0 border=1 style="font-family: verdana, sans-serif; margin: 0 0 1em 1em; font-size:90%; background-color: #f7f8ff;" |'''Date''' |'''English Name''' |---- |January 1 |[[New Year's Day]] |---- |January 4 |Day of the Martyrs |---- |May 1 |[[Labor Day]] |---- |May 17 |[[Liberation Day]] |---- |June 30 |[[Independence Day]] |---- |August 1 |Parents' Day |---- |November 17 |[[Army Day]] |---- |} {{Africa_in_topic|Public holidays in}} {{DRC topics}} {{DRCongo-stub}} [[Category:Public holidays by country|Congo (Dem)]] [[Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo society]] [[Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo culture]]
